Expect BN to form a very powerful opposition. First few years will be spent blaming BN for everything that happened in the past and BN trying to dig up dirt on PH as much as possible. After a few (maybe 10 or more) years Malaysia will develop a mature 2 party democratic system with proper checks and balances restored. Short term will be choppy but long term its necessary.

They're more likely to increase the tax for the rich. Because there have to be a replacement for GST. There's no such thing as abolishment of taxes. PH supporters can keep dreaming. When new tax structure is introduced to replace GST, another wave of price surge will follow
